explanation: [0-0] The video starts on a grassy field with two boys standing on it. One boy is wearing a black hoodie and grey sweatpants, while the other shorter, bald boy is wearing a black robe. In the background, there are trees and other people playing.

[0-10] The boy in the black hoodie starts walking towards the bald boy and puts his hand on his shoulder. He then takes off his hoodie, revealing his fluffy, curly hair in a showy manner. The bald boy then touches his own bald head and takes out a pair of scissors. Seeing this, the boy in the black hoodie becomes scared and hurriedly puts his hoodie back on, hiding his hair.
